text.autoconfig.pling.title: Pling Configuration
text.autoconfig.pling.option.sound.@Tool: The identifier of the sound to play.
text.autoconfig.pling.option.pitch.@Tool: The pitch of the sound to play.
text.autoconfig.pling.option.playWhenWor: When enabled, the loading sound will
play after a world is loaded.
text.autoconfig.pling.option.requireUnfo: When enabled, the loading sound will
only play when the game window is.
